Description_lang: The caster channels Shadowflame energy into players, inflicting $s3 Shadowflame damage every $t3 sec for $d.After channeling, the targeted players explode, inflicting $424960s1 Shadowflame damage to players within $424960a1 yards.
AuraDescription_lang: Inflicts $s3 Shadowflame damage every $t3 sec.Explodes upon expiration, inflicting $424960s1 Shadowflame damage to players within $424960a1 yards.
